description:
http://anidb.net/ch7220 [Urameshi Yuusuke], 14 years of age, is about as troublesome and violent as teenagers come. He is constantly ditching school, causing uproar, and getting into numerous fights everyday. One day however, he does the unexpected: sacrificing himself to save a young child. Such an action was never ever expected, especially coming from someone as troublesome as Yuusuke. The afterlife is not prepared for Yuusuke, as they never thought he would make such a sacrifice. Nowhere to go, and dead, Yuusuke becomes a ghost and must earn his way back into existence.
Yuusuke is "employed" by http://anidb.net/ch25880 [Koenma], who is in charge while his father and ruler of the afterlife, King Enma, is away. Under Koenma`s command, Yuusuke helps to stop menacing demons that threaten the lives of people everywhere - whether by stealing priceless and invaluable items and destructive weapons, or by wreaking havoc on humans.
Throughout Yuusuke`s journey, he is usually joined by his arch-rival, and local bully, http://anidb.net/ch7221 [Kuwabara Kazuma]; he is also joined by two demons named http://anidb.net/ch7224 [Hiei] and http://anidb.net/ch7223 [Kurama], who are ex-convicts of the afterlife that managed to escape from Koenma.
This group of unlikely allies goes on to participate and struggle in battles that have outcomes that determine the fate of humanity!
Yu Yu Hakusho is created by popular mangaka http://anidb.net/cr874 [Togashi Yoshihiro], who is also responsible for creating the acclaimed and much-loved series known as http://anidb.net/a132 [Hunter X Hunter].

REGULAR.description:
Teen hoodlum Yusuke is having a typical day – until he makes the ultimate sacrifice by diving in front of a speeding car to save a little boy’s life! Is it really time for this brash young man’s existence to come to an end?
Source: crunchyroll

After entering the Spirit World, Yusuke meets Koenma, a 700 year-old ruler with the body of a toddler! But there’s no room for laughs, as Koenma gives Yusuke an ordeal to restore his life: hatching a Spirit Beast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: No Mundo Espiritual - Teste da Ressurreição
No Mundo Espiritual - Teste da Ressurreição
Reikai no Koenma! Fukkatsu e no Shiren
霊界のコエンマ! 復活への試練

REGULAR.description:
With his rival Yusuke gone, Kuwabara is the new kid to beat, which means he’s making plenty of enemies. Yusuke isn’t fond of this classmate, but if he wants to win back his life, he’ll need to give him a ghostly hand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une amitié à la vie à la mort
追いつめられた桑原! 男の誓い

REGULAR.description:
Spirit World forgot an important question: does anyone even want Yusuke back? And will Yusuke give up the Spirit Beast, his one chance of reviving, when his friends suddenly find themselves in danger?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 熱き炎! 恋人のきずな

REGULAR.description:
Back in the flesh, Yusuke finds he can see supernatural creatures hiding in the living world and quickly hunts down a demon criminal. With this move, he learns his adventure is only beginning. Yusuke is now a Spirit Detective!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幽助復活! 新たなる使命

REGULAR.description:
Three demon thieves have muscled their way into King Yama’s vault, stealing the three Artifacts of Darkness. Yusuke must recover the artifacts and bring the thieves to justice before they unleash their powers upon the Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sambiki no Youkai! Hiei, Kurama, Gouki
三匹の妖怪! 飛影・蔵馬・剛鬼

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke’s closing in on Gouki, a monster that’s capturing the souls of children, when the second thief suddenly appears. His name is Kurama, and he asks Yusuke for a surprising favor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurama no Himitsu?! Haha to Ko no Kizuna
蔵馬の秘密?! 母と子のきずな

REGULAR.description:
The ruthless demon Hiei kidnaps Yusuke’s girlfriend, Kayko. Urameshi must retrieve the antidote inside Hiei’s Shadow Sword before Kayko becomes a brainless slave!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 螢子あやうし! 邪眼師・飛影

REGULAR.description:
Aging psychic Genkai is ready to find a student worthy of her Spirit Wave technique, but demonic Rando plans to steal the technique and use it for mass destruction! Yusuke must go undercover and infiltrate Genkai’s compound!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幻海の継承者トーナメント開始

REGULAR.description:
The candidates for Genkai’s apprenticeship have been narrowed to eight. Among them: Yusuke, Kuwabara, and the disguised demon Rando! Genkai announces the final test will be a tournament – fought in total darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurayami no Shitou! Kuwabara: Reiki no Ken
暗闇の死闘! 桑原・霊気の剣

REGULAR.description:
In his first match of the tournament, Yusuke can’t see a thing in the pitch-black arena, but Kibano is able to follow Urameshi’s every move. If the detective survives Kibano, his next fight – against a ninja – will start immediately!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: O luptă grea pentru Yusuke. Un contraatac sângeros
Yuusuke Kusen! Kizu Darake no Hangeki
幽助苦戦! 傷だらけの反撃!!

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke, Kuwabara, and Shorin are the only fighters still standing in the Genkai Tournament. Yet Rando has not been found. Could this mean that Shorin is actually Rando? Or is the demon lurking somewhere in the shadows?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Apariţia lui Rando. Marea înfrângere a lui Kuwabara
Rando Arawaru! Kuwabara Munen no Haiboku
乱童あらわる! 桑原無念の敗北

REGULAR.description:
As Yusuke’s energy dwindles, the evil Rando reveals his true and monstrous form. Can the injured Yusuke beat the human-hunting demon’s 99 deadly techniques and close the case?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yusuke contra Rando. Magie după magie
Yuusuke vs Rando: Midare Tobu Youjutsu
幽助VS乱童 乱れとぶ妖術!!

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke must take action to stop sinister forces from flooding the earth with demons. With Kuwabara at his side, Urameshi prepares to face four deadly creatures known as the Saint Beasts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cele patru bestii sacre din Castelul Labirint
Meikyuu Shiro no Yon Seijuu! Reikai e no Chousen
迷宮城の四聖獣! 霊界への挑戦

REGULAR.description:
Kurama and Hiei join Yusuke and Kuwabara in battle against the Saint Beasts. After the awkward allies struggle through the Gate of Betrayal, they face the first Beast: a giant made of solid stone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cele patru bestii sacre. O provocare pentru lumea spirituală
Kurama et le combat de la rose
Utsukushi Kibara no Mai! Karei Naru Kurama
美しきバラの舞! 華麗なる蔵馬

REGULAR.description:
One of Yusuke’s teammates has been badly injured, and Kuwabara insists on fighting the next enemy all by himself. Before the bickering group can disagree, a roar slices through the castle – the second Saint Beast is set to attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le combat de Kuwabara et son Épée Astrale
Nobi yo Reiken! Kuwabara: Otoko no Shoubu
Vino, sabie spirituală! Lupta lui Kuwabara!
伸びよ霊剣! 桑原・男の勝負

REGULAR.description:
Byakko is seemingly defeated – until Yusuke’s team enters the Beast’s secret lair! Does Kuwabara have what it takes to crush Byakko once and for all?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Strigătul de război al tigrului alb

REGULAR.description:
Two of the four Saint Beasts are dead – or so Yusuke and his team believe! But in the chamber of Seiryu, a Beast who can trap his enemies in ice, an unexpected guest arrives. How can two Beasts in one room be stopped?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiei luptă! Sabia lui îi taie pe duşmani in bucăţi!
飛影出戦! 切り裂く剣

REGULAR.description:
Humans controlled by the Makai Insects have been sent to hunt down Kayko! Yusuke’s only chance to save her is to destroy the Makai Whistle, which rests in the hand of Suzaku, the final Saint Beast!
Source: crunchyroll

As three battles rage simultaneously, Suzaku reveals his most incredible technique of all: multiplying himself for a total of seven deadly Suzakus! Can Yusuke overcome these odds and save the girl he cares about most?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 奥義激突! 七人の朱雀

REGULAR.description:
In Maze Castle’s highest tower, Suzaku forces the exhausted Yusuke to his knees. Clearly, there is only one way for the war against the Saint Beasts to end. Yusuke must surrender his life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幽助・命を賭けた反撃

REGULAR.description:
The Ice Apparition Yukina, whose tears transform into jewels, has been abducted by Tarukane. Yusuke, Kuwabara, and Botan quickly plot a rescue mission – but why is Hiei not allowed to know?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悲しみの美少女・雪菜

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke’s Spirit Detective team continues toward Tarukane’s mountain stronghold, facing a small army of grotesque demon guards. And Kuwabara fights with extra passion after declaring he’s in love with Yukina!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 闇の使者! 戸愚呂兄弟

REGULAR.description:
Struggling their way to the front gates of Tarukane’s stronghold, Yusuke, Kuwabara, and Botan now face a much greater challenge: three notorious demon fighters known throughout Spirit World as the Triad!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恐ろしき強敵! 三鬼衆

REGULAR.description:
One battle stands in the way of Yukina’s rescue: Yusuke and Kuwabara versus the Toguro Brothers! Elsewhere, Kurama races to stop Hiei, who is entering Tarukane’s stronghold with his own violent agenda!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 燃えろ桑原! 愛の底力

REGULAR.description:
Spirit World makes a chilling discovery: the Toguro Brothers faked defeat! Now Yusuke must enter a competition run by the criminal world – or everyone he knows will be hunted down and destroyed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vrem să fim puternici! Intoarcerea fraţilor Toguro
暗黒武術会への招待者

REGULAR.description:
The Dark Tournament attracts the most dangerous demons and humans that the world has ever seen. But before the competition begins, Yusuke’s crew must survive the boat ride to Hanging-Neck Island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le tournoi des arts martiaux de l`ombre
Shi no Funade! Jigoku no Shime e
死の船出! 地獄の島へ

REGULAR.description:
Team Urameshi is slated for the first fight against the Rokuyukai Team, but with Yusuke locked in deep slumber, the role of team captain falls on Kuwabara. With Spirit Sword drawn, he volunteers for the first match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Kyouteki! Suzu Koma no Higi
小さな強敵! 鈴駒の秘技

REGULAR.description:
In the second match, Kurama’s opponent holds a secret that threatens the person he holds most dear! Can Roto be defeated before the unthinkable happens?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chi no Hana o Sakasu Kurama!

REGULAR.description:
Hiei takes on Rokuyukai’s leader, Zeru, whose explosive fire attacks ravage the stadium. Hiei must resort to an unbelievable technique, one that could take his life as well: he must summon the power of a dragon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 未完の奥義・炎殺黒龍波

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke jumps out of his slumber, ready for the final fight against a new fighter named Chu. He’s rude, he’s crude –and he claims to be Team Rokuyukai’s true leader.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: よいどれ戦士! 酎の酔拳

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke and Chu, both drained of their Spirit Energy, struggle to win the first round of the Dark Tournament for their team. They agree to settle it with a Knife Edge Death-Match, an intense and fatal arena of combat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナイフエッジデスマッチ

REGULAR.description:
When he’s ambushed by a loose-cannon competitor, Yusuke learns that even quiet moments on Hanging-Neck Island are dangerous. Meanwhile, Hiei faces the consequences of his deadly dragon attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突! ベスト8出そろう

REGULAR.description:
Round two of the tournament arrives and Team Urameshi must face Dr. Ichigaki’s fighters, a group with a habit of chopping off their opponent’s heads! Will Yusuke be the doctor’s next guinea pig?
Source: crunchyroll

During a three-on-three battle, a rip on the Masked Fighter’s headdress gives a surprising peek into the warrior’s true identity! But there’s little time to ponder the ramifications, as Kuwabara now refuses to fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adevărul din spatele măştii, un luptător chipeş
覆面の正体?! 美しき戦士

REGULAR.description:
The doctor’s human experiments are clearly fighting against their will! As Yusuke prepares to put them out of their misery, the Masked Fighter intervenes and suggests a peculiar plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ambition Destroyed: A Trial of Light
Yabou o Funsai! Hikari no Senrei
野望を粉砕! 光りの洗礼

REGULAR.description:
Team Urameshi must face Team Masho, but a scheme by the team’s owner ensnares Hiei and the Masked Fighter before the fight! With Kuwabara injured, Yusuke and Kurama will have to take this entire team alone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`équipe de Masho, les ninjas des Ténèbres
闇の忍・魔性使いチーム

REGULAR.description:
The fighters of Team Masho are revealed to be the Shinobi of Spirit World, an ancient ninja sect. Now, thanks to Gama’s curse, Kurama must face the Ice Master Touya without the use of his body or his energy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 蔵馬無惨! 死の化粧

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke tries to step in for the unconscious Kurama, but the crooked tournament committee announces that Kurama must remain. Can Yusuke overcome the rule-makers, save Kurama, and fight the last three opponents himself?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 粉砕! 幽助怒りの鉄拳

REGULAR.description:
Jin, Team Masho’s fourth member, is a fast-talking Master of Wind who hates authority. He identifies with Yusuke more than any guy ever has, but with everything at stake, they must lay their friendship aside.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jin, stăpânul vântului. O încăierare pe cinste
風使い陣! 嵐の空中戦

REGULAR.description:
When Yusuke realizes his regular attacks won’t help him against Jin, he decides to try the Spirit Wave. But even if he can somehow execute the move and defeat his opponent, will the corrupt Tournament Committee let him win?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 霊光弾! 意外な決着?!

REGULAR.description:
Team Masho’s leader looks impossible to beat, but as Yukina tries desperately to enter the stadium, Kuwabara will have to find the strength to save his team. He’s Team Urameshi’s only hope!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Matter of Love and Death
Kesshi no Kuwabara! Ai no Totsugeki
決死の桑原! 愛の突撃

REGULAR.description:
With his Spirit Beast finally hatching, Yusuke faces the possibility of it swallowing his soul forever. And there’s yet another surprise in store for Urameshi, when the true identity of the Masked Fighter is at last exposed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 覆面戦士の厳しき素顔

REGULAR.description:
As his team prepares for the semi-finals, Yusuke is taken to a cave in the woods where Genkai will give him his final test. Is Yusuke’s soul pure enough to handle the intense mental and physical trial?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maboroshi Umi kara no Saidai no Shiren
幻海からの最大の試練

REGULAR.description:
Hiei faces Kuro Momotaro, an opponent with the ability to prevent certain attacks by adapting his body. Hiei’s only chance lies in a dangerous technique that could easily finish his opponent – but at the cost of his own life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiei continuă lupta! Foloseşte lovitura dragonului negru!
飛影連戦! 撃て黒龍波!

REGULAR.description:
Hiei’s attacks have proven useless against Kuro Momotaro, and as his raging opponent prepares to make a third and final transformation, Hiei prepares to join his shattered sword on the arena floor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 戦慄! 黒桃太郎の変身

REGULAR.description:
After fifteen years in his borrowed human form, the demon Yoko Kurama has returned. Ura Urashima’s evil plan causes the ultra-powerful Spirit Fox to reveal his true power. What could this mean for Team Urameshi?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 伝説の盗賊! 妖狐・蔵馬

REGULAR.description:
Kuwabara is set to square off against Shishi Wakamaru, but his source of power, Yukina, is nowhere to be found. Shishi’s secret weapon sends Kuwabara through a dimensional portal. What will he find on the other side?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atuul lui Shishiwakaramu, Promontoriul fărş întoarcere!
闇アイテム・死出の羽衣

REGULAR.description:
Unmasked and without the power of her Spirit Wave, Genkai must rely on her wits to survive in the ring. But is the wise woman’s intellect enough to combat the horror of Shishi Wakamaru’s Chorus of a Thousand Skulls?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genkai. Luptă cu ultimul strop de putere!
Nokosareta Chikara! Maboroshi Umi no Shitou
残された力! 幻海の死闘

REGULAR.description:
Onji has his work cut out for him when he takes on Kuwabara and Genkai. However, the old man is not who he appears to be, and what lies beneath the surface could spell a major upset for Team Urameshi!
Source: crunchyroll

The strengths of Team Toguro are revealed in full as they take the arena floor. Meanwhile, Yusuke is caught in a deep slumber as Genkai heads off to face her former partner in battle – and settle a 50 year old score!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shukumei no Taiketsu! Toguro no Kage
Un adversar foarte puternic. Umbra lui Toguro
宿命の対決! 戸愚呂の影

REGULAR.description:
The history of Genkai and Toguro is finally revealed! Genkai is at the mercy of her former friend, and as Toguro prepares to deliver the final blow, Yusuke races toward the scene of the battle. What will he find when he arrives?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genkai moare. Un final după 50 de ani
Maboroshi Umi Chiru! 50 Nen Me no Kecchaku

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke’s emotions over the death of Genkai are like no trial he has ever faced. There is no time to waste – his team must move on and overcome their despair.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arashi no Zen! Kanashimi o Koete
嵐の前! 悲しみを越えて

REGULAR.description:
Each team must take on an extra member in order to compete in the tournament finals. Who are the two new fighters and what could they possibly bring to their new teams?
Source: crunchyroll

Kurama finds himself facing the dangerous Karasu. Kurama, believing that it’s his only chance to defeat his eerie opponent, transforms himself into the powerful and equally ruthless Yoko Kurama.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 爆烈! 目覚めた妖狐

REGULAR.description:
Karasu is set to take the victory! Taking his own life into his hands, Kurama prepares to sacrifice his life energy to defeat the demon. But with no life energy remaining, Kurama may stay down forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kesshi no Kuraba! Saigo no Shudan
決死の蔵馬! 最後の手段

REGULAR.description:
After a disappointing verdict is handed down in the Kurama versus Karasu match, Hiei seeks to recover from the setback in the ring with Bui. Will the power lurking beneath Bui’s armor be too much for him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: E în pericol! Bui ii scoate armura!
Kyoui! Yoroi o Hazushita Take Takeshi
脅威! 鎧を外した武威

REGULAR.description:
Hiei unleashes his most powerful attack, the Dragon of the Darkness Flame, but Bui is able to turn the Dragon against his master. Will Hiei be swallowed and destroyed by his own power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 究極奥義! ほえろ黒龍波

REGULAR.description:
After hearing of Genkai’s death, Kuwabara strikes Toguro with the Trial Sword and splits the demon in half! The arena watches in horror as the evil Toguro rises from the floor unharmed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toguro Kei no Bukimi na Kage
Umbra ciudată a lui Toguro senior
戸愚呂兄の不気味な影

REGULAR.description:
Before Yusuke’s grudge match with the younger Toguro can begin, intrigue at Team Toguro culminates in a shocking proposal from Sakyo – and an even more shocking response from Koenma!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 怒り爆発! 桑原の反撃

REGULAR.description:
The ultimate showdown between Yusuke and Toguro finally begins, and Urameshi reveals the power he inherited from Genkai with a colossal blast of his Spirit Gun. Is it enough to bring down Toguro once and for all?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shukumei no Taiketsu! Arashi no Taishousen Kaishi
Yusuke contra Toguro. Începe lupta finală
宿命の対決! 嵐の大将戦開始

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke removes the Spirit Cuffs before launching an attack at his nemesis. But Toguro has powered up to his top level and stares down Yusuke’s Spirit Blast.
Source: crunchyroll

Toguro begins to suck the souls of the spectators in order to enrage the fallen Urameshi and bring out his full power. But Toguro soon learns that the best way to provoke Yusuke is to kill one of his friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yusuke, o misiune tristă. La maxim
Yuusuke! Genkai e no Kanashii Shiren
幽助! 限界への悲しい試練

REGULAR.description:
After Yusuke powers up to the same level as Toguro, the demon must power up to 120% of his capacity. Can either fighter, each completely devoid of any remaining energy, survive to claim the prize?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitou Kecchaku! Saigo no Full Power
死闘決着! 最後のフルパワー

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke must begin to cope with the loss of his best friend at the hands of Toguro. Meanwhile, after Sakyo asks Koenma to take his life, the billionaire unveils his final plan: destroying the stadium with everyone still inside!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tougijou to Tomo ni Kieru Yabou
闘技場と共に消える野望

REGULAR.description:
Team Urameshi prepares to return to the world of the living and leave their fallen mentor and friend behind. But, far away, a chance encounter between two former allies offers a hint of things to come.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toguro no Tsugunai: Ichiban no Nozomi
戸愚呂の償い・一番の望み

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke falls into the hands of powerful new adversaries, forcing Kuwabara to round up the old gang in order to stage a rescue attempt!
Source: crunchyroll

At the Rokurokubi Estates, Kaitou explains the rules of his territory to Kuwabara, Kurama, and Hiei. Can the three warriors be of any use in a place where all forms of violence are strictly prohibited?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zon Jigen Yashiki ni Hisomu Wana
四次元屋敷にひそむ罠

REGULAR.description:
Kurama places his soul on the line and issues a challenge to Kaitou: one by one, the letters of the alphabet will become taboo. If any of the taboo sounds are uttered, the speaker will face a terrible penalty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taboo no Power! Zouba no Zunou
禁句(タブー)のパワー! 蔵馬の頭脳

REGULAR.description:
The gang reaches the captive Yusuke, but Kido has a final game to play with the Spirit Detective. One of his friends is an imposter, and Yusuke has only minutes to determine which one it is! With his decision made, Yusuke attacks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恐るべき真実! 新たな謎

REGULAR.description:
Between the Living World and the Demon World, a tunnel is being carved that could usher in darkness and chaos. In a bold move, Sensui begins his search for the person that will finally allow him to complete the tunnel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eroarea. Poarta spre lumea spiritelor rele
Semari Kuru Kyoufu! Makai no Tobira
迫り来る恐怖! 魔界の扉

REGULAR.description:
The Spirit Detective’s best chance to uncover the truth behind the tunnel lies with the mind reader, Murota. But mere hours after entering Mushiyori City, Yusuke and team find themselves being hunted by an unseen evil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Makai no Shisha! Nananin no Teki
魔界の使者! 七人の敵

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke’s mind reader, Murota, is shot while attempting to weed out the psychic responsible for the tunnel between worlds. When the gang takes Murota to the hospital, new dangers appear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 忍び寄るドクターの魔の手

REGULAR.description:
The Doctor, a super-strong human with immense psychic powers, has infected the entire hospital with a deadly virus. In order to save his friends, Yusuke may have no choice but to destroy the wretched creature.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: テリトリーを打ちやぶれ!!

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke has defeated the Doctor, one of the seven psychics trying to forge a tunnel between worlds. Somewhere in Mushiyori City, six more – Game Master, Sniper, Gourmet, Sea Man, Gate Keeper, and Black Angel – remain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シーマン・雨に潜む罠

REGULAR.description:
Kuwabara is struggling to keep up with Sea Man’s power – and with Kurama, Yusuke, and Genkai nowhere to be seen, it appears no one is coming to the rescue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 桑原復活?! 目覚めた力

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke learns the dark secret behind Sensui’s traumatic fall from Spirit Detective to the one who would wipe out all humanity. After hearing the truth, Urameshi begins his quest to defeat the fallen Spirit Detective once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trecutul întunecat al unui detectiv din lumea spirituală

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke and Sensui continue their battle, but despite all his efforts, Yusuke is not able to prevent the dark detective’s kidnapping of Kuwabara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出撃! ダークエンジェル

REGULAR.description:
As Yusuke continues his chase of Sensui, the unbelievable Sniper appears. As Genkai and the rest of the team follow, can Yusuke escape Sniper’s endless barrage, reach Sensui, and save Kuwabara?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yusuke aleargă cu mânie! Salvarea lui Kuwabara!
幽助激走! 桑原を救え!

REGULAR.description:
Hiei has finally returned to his former teammates to join in their crusade, but will that be enough to free Kuwabara before Gourmet can consume his power and tear the Kekkai Barrier to shreds?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 刃霧の標的! 死紋十字斑

REGULAR.description:
When Yusuke, Kurama, Hiei, and Mitarai enter the Game Master’s territory, they’re forced into a twisted game where everyone must play by the rules in order to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doukutsu no Naka no Game World
洞窟の中のゲームワールド

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke’s team must win three more rounds to defeat the Game Master and move on to Sensui’s lair. The hole to the Demon World is rapidly expanding. Can they make it there in time to prevent the end of the world?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゲームマスター脅威の実力

REGULAR.description:
With only two hours until the tunnel opens and unleashes a horde of demons upon the world of the living, Kurama steps forth to battle Game Master for the right to move on to Sensui’s lair.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 残された手段! 蔵馬の決断

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke’s gang reaches Sensui’s lair, but their battle to save humanity is just beginning. As the opening to Demon World widens rapidly, an old nemesis appears – and he’s got Kurama in his sights.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuraba no Ikari! Shoutai wa Dare Da?!
蔵馬の怒り! 正体は誰だ?!

REGULAR.description:
The tunnel to Demon World is opening. Can Yusuke’s team still save the human race? Only a dramatic showdown between past and present Spirit Detectives will reveal the truth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Detectivii lumii spirituale. Lupta om la om
Reikai Tantei: Shukumei no Ichiki Uchi
霊界探偵・宿命の一騎討ち

REGULAR.description:
The battle between Yusuke and Sensui continues, and Yusuke learns he is no match for the former Spirit Detective. As Sensui prepares the finishing blow, aid comes in a most unexpected package.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幽助苦戦! 決定的な差

REGULAR.description:
As Itsuki explains more about the bizarre Sensui, Koenma prepares to use his most powerful weapon to create a barrier that may stop the demons from flooding Living World.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: コエンマ・覚悟の魔封環!

REGULAR.description:
Koenma’s tactics have saved Yusuke for now, but Yusuke won’t allow the Prince of Spirit World to use his pacifier.  While they discuss their next move, the terrible gateway between Demon World and Living World opens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 仙水・解き放たれた聖光気

REGULAR.description:
Filled with rage, Kuwabara watches helplessly as Yusuke struggles in battle against Sensui. He manages to free Kurama and Hiei, but it appears Yusuke Urameshi is doomed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 予感! 全てが止まる時

REGULAR.description:
Kuwabara, Kurama, and Hiei unleash their most devastating attacks on Sensui, who retreats within the tunnel. Meanwhile, King Yama reveals a dark secret to Botan. What does he know about Yusuke that the others do not?
Source: crunchyroll

Kuwabara, Kurama, and Hiei charge into the tunnel in an effort to rid all worlds of Sensui forever. Meanwhile, King Yama’s soldiers arrive to take Yusuke’s body away in order to ensure he is never revived.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 覚醒の時! バトル再び

REGULAR.description:
Although Yusuke’s skill and strength have increased, he is still clumsy with his new abilities. Unfortunately, there is no time to adjust and practice his new powers – Sensui is ready for their final confrontation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuukyoku no Tatakai! Mazoku no Akashi
究極の戦い! 魔族の証

REGULAR.description:
As the battle against Sensui concludes, Koenma tells Yusuke that he must choose between Demon World and Living World. Without hesitation, Yusuke makes his decision!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dovada finală. Viaţă sau moarte în lumea de apoi!

REGULAR.description:
When Yusuke’s team returns topside, King Yama’s soldiers arrive with orders to destroy Yusuke once and for all.  Could this be the end? How much energy does the Spirit Detective have after his exhausting battle with Sensui?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エピローグ! 明日へ!

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke Urameshi suffers from a recurring nightmare that he just can’t shake. In order to figure out the deeper meaning behind the bizarre dreams, Genkai sends Yusuke to the home of a former Spirit Detective.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuusuke no Unmei: Kiken no Ashioto
幽助の運命・危険の足音

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke learns that his ancestor is a king in Demon World! Unless Urameshi travels to Demon World soon, the balance of power could shift and spell the end of humanity’s reign at the top of the food chain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 闇の訪問者・深まる謎

REGULAR.description:
Two kings of Demon World offer Kurama and Hiei dangerous propositions. Meanwhile, Yusuke learns that the only thing more difficult than making an irreversible decision is convincing Kayko that everything will be all right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 別れ・それぞれの旅立ち

REGULAR.description:
Control of Demon World is divided among three rulers: Raizen, Yomi, and Mukuro. From his deathbed, Raizen invites his descendant, Yusuke, to return to Demon World to train – and challenges him to a battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Makai e! Chichi to no Taimen
Plecarea în lumea spiritelor rele. Întâlnirea cu tata
魔界へ! 父との対面

REGULAR.description:
After years in exile, Hiei finally returns to his homeland with one thing on his mind: revenge. But to complete his mission, Hiei must first survive an encounter with yet another demon from his past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wasure Enu Kioku: Tanjou no Toki
忘れ得ぬ記憶・誕生の時

REGULAR.description:
Now that Hiei has become strong enough to easily slay A-Class Demons, Mukuro calls forth an even tougher foe: the demon that implanted Hiei’s Jagan Eye! Does Hiei have the strength – and desire – to survive the encounter?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 明かされる邪眼の秘密

REGULAR.description:
Yomi, one of the three Kings of Demon World, has summoned Kurama to his inner sanctum. Just as Yusuke and Hiei were forced to face their demons, Kurama must now confront the secrets of his own past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bandiţii din lumea de apoi. După 1000 de ani
魔界盗賊・千年目の再会

REGULAR.description:
Yomi has forced Kurama to serve as his advisor, but the alliance is hardly stable due to the ancient hatred they share. Meanwhile, some familiar faces from the past return for one more shot against Yusuke!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Transformarea lui Youko. Îndemnul de a ucide
妖狐変化! 忍び寄る殺意

REGULAR.description:
It’s been nearly a year since Yusuke, Hiei, and Kurama arrived in Demon World. With the former teammates in high positions on conflicting sides, can Yusuke prevent an inevitable clash and keep Demon World at peace?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi no Yuigon: Tooi Hi no Omoi
Dorinţa tatălui meu. O amintire de preţ
父の遺言・遠い日の想い

REGULAR.description:
Raizen’s death has upset the balance of power in Demon World. As Mukuro and Yomi prepare their next move, Yusuke arrives at a brilliant decision that just might preserve the peace. But at what cost?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Igai na Teian: Makai no Hendou
O propunere neaşteptată. Schimbarea lumii de apoi
意外な提案・魔界の変動

REGULAR.description:
By embracing Yusuke’s unlikely proposal, Yomi and Mukuro have secured peace for the moment. Nonetheless, the battle to control Demon World must begin. Who will win the tournament and grasp complete power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Turneul lumii de apoi. Prima partidă

REGULAR.description:
As the preliminary round of the tournament draws to a close, one match between a father and son still rages on. Before the competition can continue, the vigor of youth must defeat the patience of age.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bătălia dintre tată şi fiu. Yomi vs Shura
The Battle of Father and Son
闘う親子! 黄泉と修羅

REGULAR.description:
As the main bouts of the Demon World tournament get underway, it looks like some of the fighters’ motivations for entering aren’t exactly what they seemed. They all have their eyes on one warrior as the prize – Yusuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: O luptă dură. Visul fiecărui luptător
激闘! 夢に賭けた男たち

REGULAR.description:
Kurama must face Shigure in the ring, and as tempers and anxieties flare, the resurgence of Yoko Kurama begins! Will Kurama find a way to keep his anger from taking over?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 蔵馬, 過去との決別

REGULAR.description:
Hiei steps into the ring against Mukuro, who proves willing to exploit the horrors of Hiei’s past. Will this give the shackled fighter the advantage? In order to survive, Hiei prepares to unleash his ultimate weapon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La confrontation entre Hiei et Mokuro
O luptă pe viaţă. Hiei şi Mukuro
対決! 飛影とムクロ

REGULAR.description:
As the Demon World Tournament rages on, Yusuke finds himself staring down Yomi. Both warriors have their own reasons for competing, but one soon learns he may not have any reason to continue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ore no Chikara: Kore ga Subeta Da!
Puterea mea. Asta e tot ce am
俺の力・これが全てだ!

REGULAR.description:
Yusuke awakens from his fight with Yomi to discover all but one fighter has been eliminated! Demon World has its new King! Who emerged victorious? And what does it mean for the three worlds?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決着! 激闘の果てに

REGULAR.description:
Kuwabara is studying hard for his college entrance exams, but nothing could prepare him for what happens when he arrives at a mysterious meeting with Genkai. One after the other, the old gang shows up – but where is Yusuke?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フォーエバー! 幽遊白書

SPECIAL.description:
Experience a full recap of the best Team Urameshi fight scenes! Featuring the bruising match between Yusuke and Chu, a tough brawl against the Dr. Ichigaki Team, and watch Hiei call upon the flames of the Demon Realm against Zeru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho: Ankoku Bujutsukai no Shou - Gekan
映像白書~暗黒武術会の章~下巻

SPECIAL.description:
Skip to the brawling greatness and relive the epic battles of the Dark Tournament with a full recap of the best Team Urameshi fighting scenes including the epic bout between Genki and Toguro!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho: Ankoku Bujutsukai no Shou - Joukan
映像白書~暗黒武術会の章~上巻

SPECIAL.description:
During a stress-relieving sparring match, Yusuke and Hiei come face to face with a pair of stout beasts from the Demon Realm. After doing away with the monsters, the story turns to Hiei and his mysterious origin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho II: Hiei no Shou
Eizou Hakusho II: The Hiei Chapters

SPECIAL.description:
The reckless Kuwabara reminisces about a first encounter with Yusuke while being held captive by Shinobu. Will his anger be enough to power his escape and help Yusuke defeat Shinobu?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho II: Kuwabara no Shou
Eizou Hakusho II: The Kuwabara Chapters

SPECIAL.description:
During a quest to steal three spirit realm treasures, Kurama and Hiei meet Yusuke for the first time. A shift to the mysterious origin story of Kurama and a heated battle versus Shigure shows the true heart of this rose-whipping fighter!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho II: Kurama no Shou
Eizou Hakusho II: The Kurama Chapters

SPECIAL.description:
After getting dumped by his girlfriend Keiko, Yusuke travels to the Demon Realm for a showdown with Yomi. Even after the break-up, Yusuke promises that he will return in three years time to take her hand in marriage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho II: The Yusuke Chapters
Eizou Hakusho II: Yuusuke no Shou

SPECIAL.description: A discussion between some of the Funimation English language voice actors about the adaptation process.
A discussion between some of the marketing and art staff who were involved with the packaging and design for the Funimation English language Steelbook BD release.

titles.title: オープニングエンディング大百科

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 幽☆遊☆白書_(テレビアニメ)

titles.title: Yu Yu Hakusho - Yu Degli Spettri
คนเก่งฟ้าประทาน
Yu Yu Hakusho - Les aventuriers de l`au-delà
